trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Bonner Springs
There were no other sightings in Bonner Springs on or around July 25th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting in the front row of the Sandstome Amphitheatre and my 5 year old son first saw a light and asked if it was a satellite, (a bright light moving slowly high in the sky). Since there were few stars viable, I looked as we sat there and saw the light, and confirmed to him indeed it was a satellite as it was a bright light moving slowly over the concert area from south to north. The light then zigzagged in a "Z" fashion and moved fasted to the east and the light dimmed and finally extinguished prior to the horizon. We had watched planes before sundown and this was not in the flight pattern of other planes we had been watching previously, and don't believe that a helicopter to have made such rapid moves, nor would have had such a bright light. People behind me (none of us under the influence of drugs or alcohol) all thought it an unusual occurrence.
Summary: Bright light, thought it was a satillite. Passing slowly then zigzagged and went in another direction, and faded.
